thread.section_title: The NoMad Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: New Favorite
thread.title_full: New Favorite - Review of The NoMad Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CalGirl435
title: New Favorite
text: I travel to NYC several times a year for work and this is now my preferred hotel. Friendly and warm check in, beautiful rooms that are hip and don't feel like a typically hotel room, great sheets, great towels, great shower. Delicious breakfast. I didn't like their coffee but that's my only gripe. Love this place.
